TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class BaseValidator : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label, System.Web.UI.IValidator

Public MustInherit Class BaseValidator Inherits Label Implements IValidator
public ref class BaseValidator abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Label, System::Web::UI::IValidator
type BaseValidator = class inherit Label interface IValidator

summary.span: 用作验证控件的抽象基类。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为所有验证控件提供核心实现。The class provides the core implementation for all validation controls. 验证控件用于验证关联的输入控件中的用户输入。Validation controls are used to validate user input in an associated input control. 当用户输入的值未通过验证时，验证控件将显示错误消息。When the user enters a value that fails validation, the validation control displays an error message. 因为验证控件与输入控件分离，所以可以将错误消息放置在页面上相对于输入控件的任何位置。Because a validation control is separated from the input control, you can position the error message anywhere on the page relative to the input control. ASP.NET 提供多个执行特定类型的验证的验证控件。ASP.NET provides several validation controls that perform specific types of validation. 下表介绍了这些控件。The following table describes these controls. |验证控件Validation control|说明Description| |------------------------|-----------------| ||通过将属性设置为，对输入到其他输入控件中的值、常数值或正确的数据类型验证值 。Validates a value against the value entered into another input control, against a constant value, or against a proper data type by setting the property to .| ||使用用户提供的自定义验证例程来验证值。Validates a value using a user-provided custom validation routine.| ||验证值是否在值的范围内。Validates whether a value is within a range of values.| ||使用正则表达式验证值。Validates a value using a regular expression.| ||验证是否已在必填字段中输入值。Validates that a value was entered in a required field.| 验证控件始终验证服务器上关联的输入控件。Validation controls always validate the associated input control on the server. 验证控件还具有完整的客户端实现，该实现允许启用脚本的浏览器 (例如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本4.0 和更高版本) 在客户端上执行验证。Validation controls also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 客户端验证通过在将用户输入发送到服务器之前检查用户输入来增强验证过程。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 这允许在提交窗体前在客户端上检测到错误，从而避免服务器端验证所需的信息往返。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 多个验证控件可以与单个输入控件一起用于验证不同的条件。Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria. 例如，可以对控件应用多个验证控件 。For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a control. 您可以使用 控件来确保在控件中输入的值 位于集范围内，并使用 控件确保用户输入值。You can use a control to ensure that the value entered in the control is within a set range, and a control to ensure that the user enters a value. ASP.NET 提供了许多可以回发到服务器的控件。ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server. 当其中一个控件的 `CausesValidation` 属性设置为时 `true` ，将在控件回发到服务器时执行验证。When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to the server. 以下控件能够回发到服务器：The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 其中某些控件只有在属性设置为时才会回发到服务器 `AutoPostBack` `true` 。Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`. 每个控件都有一个 `ValidationGroup` 属性，设置此属性后，当控件触发回发到服务器时，只验证指定组中的验证控件。These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server. 若要对验证控件进行分组，请将 每个验证控件的属性设置为相同的值。To group validation controls, set the property of each validation control to the same value. 若要将输入控件与验证控件关联，请使用 属性。To associate an input control with a validation control, use the property. 若要指定验证失败时要在验证控件中显示的文本，请使用 属性。To specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails, use the property. 还可以通过使用控件显示页中验证失败的所有控件的摘要 。You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a control. 若要指定要在控件中显示的文本 ，请使用 属性。To specify the text to display in a control, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果在 未设置属性的情况下设置属性，则该 属性的值 也会显示在验证控件中。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control. 使用验证程序控件时，应始终检查服务器端验证的结果，然后再执行任何处理。When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing. 在回发之后但在调用事件方法之前，页面调用验证程序控件并将其结果聚合到 属性中。After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the property. (你还可以使用方法显式调用验证程序控件 `Validate` 。 ) 在你自己的代码中，应检查属性是否在 `true` 处理输入之前返回。(You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the property returns `true` before processing input. 即使启用了脚本的浏览器可能会阻止在验证检查失败的情况下在客户端上发生回发，还应始终 在处理验证的数据之前签入服务器代码。Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check in server code before processing validated data. 您也可以手动执行验证。You can also manually perform validation. 若要验证页上的所有验证控件，请使用 方法。To validate all validation controls on the page, use the method. 可以通过使用控件的方法来验证各个验证控件 。Individual validation controls can be validated by using the method of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果在 方法中使用属性 `Page_Load` ，则必须先显式调用 方法。If you use the property in a `Page_Load` method, you must first explicitly call the method. 由于验证发生在 页的事件之后、或事件的事件处理程序之前，因此在 `Click` `Command` 调用方法之前，不会更新属性 。Because validation occurs after the event for the page, but before the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` events, the property is not updated until the method is called. 作为替代方法，可以在或事件的事件处理程序 `Click` `Command` （而不是方法）中放置代码 `Page_Load` 。As an alternative, you can place your code in the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` event instead of the `Page_Load` method. 并非所有 Web 服务器控件都支持验证控件。Not all Web server controls support validation controls. 可使用验证控件验证的标准控件包括：The standard controls that can be validated with a validation control are: - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 对于要验证的输入控件，必须将 特性应用于控件。For an input control to be validated, the attribute must be applied to the control. > [!NOTE] > 使用从控件内派生的验证程序控件时 ，请确保验证程序控件及其关联的控件位于同一面板中。When you use validator controls that derive from inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关将 控件用于部分页面更新的详细信息，请参阅 [部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). 当验证失败时，您可以通过将属性设置为来在关联的输入控件上设置焦点 `true` 。When validation fails, you can set the focus on the associated input control by setting the property to `true`. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用多个验证控件来验证用户是否在控件中输入了有效值 。The following code example demonstrates how to use multiple validation controls to verify that the user enters a valid value in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不直接调用此构造函数。This constructor is not called directly. 继承自此类的验证控件可以从其自己的构造函数调用此构造函数以初始化基属性。Validation controls that inherit from this class can call this constructor from their own constructors to initialize the base properties. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`true`| ||| ||`true`| ||`false`|

param.name: writer
param.span: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 将需要为控件呈现的 HTML 特性和样式添加到指定的 对象。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于呈现控件的 HTML 标记中控件的特性。The method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control. 此方法通常由派生类中的控件开发人员重写，以将适当的特性和样式插入 控件的输出流中。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for a control.

para.span: 重写 方法时，请确保调用基类中的相应方法。

span.span: When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class.

para.span: 否则，将不会呈现基类中包含的属性。

span.span: Otherwise, the attributes contained in the base class will not be rendered.

summary.span: 验证指定的控件是否在页面上并且是否包含验证属性。

span.span: Verifies whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是主要由方法使用的帮助器方法 ，用于验证指定的控件是否在页面上并包含验证属性。The method is a helper method used primarily by the method to verify whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties. 此方法不返回值来报告结果。This method does not return a value to report the result. 相反，它会在验证失败时引发异常。Instead, it throws an exception when verification fails. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

span.span: The specified control is not found.
-or-

exception.span: 指定的控件没有与其关联的 特性；因此无法使用验证控件对其进行验证。

span.span: The specified control does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

summary.span: 确定由 属性指定的控件是否为有效控件。

span.span: Determines whether the control specified by the property is a valid control.

returns.span: 如果由 指定的控件是有效控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control specified by is a valid control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法，主要由 属性用来确定属性是否 包含有效的输入控件。The method is a helper method used primarily by the property to determine whether the property contains a valid input control. 若要成为有效的输入控件， 必须将属性设置为某个值，并且该值必须是支持验证的页上的控件。To be a valid input control, the property must be set to some value and that value must be a control on the page that supports validation. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: 没有为 属性指定任何值。

span.span: No value is specified for the property.
-or-

exception.span: 在该页上未找到 属性指定的输入控件。

span.span: The input control specified by the property is not found on the page.
-or-

exception.span: 由 属性指定的输入控件没有与其关联的 特性；因此无法使用验证控件对其进行验证。

span.span: The input control specified by the property does not have a attribute associated with it; therefore, it cannot be validated with a validation control.

summary.span: 获取或设置要验证的输入控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the input control to validate.

value.span: 要验证的输入控件。

span.span: The input control to validate.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要验证的输入控件。Use the property to specify the input control to validate. 必须将此属性设置为除控件之外的所有验证控件的输入控件的 ID ，该控件可留空。This property must be set to the ID of an input control for all validation controls except the control, which can be left blank. 如果未指定有效的输入控件，则呈现页面时将引发异常。If you do not specify a valid input control, an exception will be thrown when the page is rendered. ID 必须引用与验证控件位于同一容器中的控件。The ID must refer to a control within the same container as the validation control. 它必须位于相同的页或用户控件中，或者必须位于模板化控件的同一模板中。It must be in the same page or user control, or it must be in the same template of a templated control. 可以验证的标准控件包括：The standard controls that can be validated are: - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 对于要验证的输入控件，必须将 特性应用于控件。For an input control to be validated, the attribute must be applied to the control. 如果由属性指定的输入控件 不包含任何文本，则除控件外，所有验证控件都将通过验证。All validation controls, except the control, will pass validation if the input control specified by the property contains no text. 如果使用的是 控件，则不会调用客户端和服务器端验证函数。If you are using a control, the client-side and server-side validation functions are not called either. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要验证的输入控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the input control to validate. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 确定验证控件是否可执行客户端验证。

span.span: Determines whether the validation control can perform client-side validation.

returns.span: 如果验证控件可执行客户端验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the validation control can perform client-side validation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个 helper 函数，主要由 属性用来确定客户端的浏览器是否支持客户端脚本。The method is a helper function that is used primarily by the property to determine whether the client's browser supports client script. 若要返回此属性 `true` ，必须满足以下条件：For this property to return `true`, the following conditions must be true: - 浏览器已启用客户端脚本。The browser has client script enabled. - 属性中存储的对象的属性 为1或更高。The property of the object that is stored in the property is 1 or later. - 属性中存储的对象的属性 为1.2 或更高版本。The property of the object that is stored in the property is 1.2 or later. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay Display { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay Display
Public Property Display As ValidatorDisplay
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidatorDisplay Display { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidatorDisplay get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidatorDisplay value); };
member this.Display : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置验证控件中错误消息的显示行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the display behavior of the error message in a validation control.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定验证控件中的错误消息的显示行为。Use the property to specify the display behavior of the error message in the validation control. 下表列出了可以使用的不同值。The following table lists the different values that can be used. |显示行为Display behavior|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`None`|验证消息从不以内联方式显示。The validation message is never displayed inline.| |`Static`|用于验证消息的空间在页面布局中分配。Space for the validation message is allocated in the page layout.| |`Dynamic`|如果验证失败，则会将验证消息的空间动态添加到页面中。Space for the validation message is dynamically added to the page if validation fails.| > [!NOTE] > 显示行为取决于是否执行客户端验证。The display behavior depends on whether client-side validation is performed. 如果客户端验证不处于活动状态 (由于浏览器不支持此功能，或者由于使用 page 指令或属性) 禁用了该功能 ， `ValidatorDisplay.Static` 并且其 `ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic` 行为方式相同：错误消息仅在显示时占用空间。If client-side validation is not active (because the browser does not support it or because it has been disabled by using the page directive or property), `ValidatorDisplay.Static` and `ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic` behave the same way: the error message takes up space only if it is displayed. 当消息未显示时，动态分配该消息的空间 (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) 仅适用于客户端验证。The ability to dynamically allocate space for the message when it is not being displayed (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) only works with client-side validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定在验证失败时，将验证消息的空间动态添加到网页。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that space for the validation message is added to the Web page dynamically when validation fails. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

Public Property EnableClientScript As Boolean
public: property bool EnableClientScript { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableClientScript : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用客户端验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用客户端验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if client-side validation is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定是否启用客户端验证。Use the property to specify whether client-side validation is enabled. 验证控件始终在服务器上执行验证。Validation controls always perform validation on the server. 它们还具有完整的客户端实现，该实现允许支持 DHTML 的浏览器 (例如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本) 在客户端上执行验证。They also have complete client-side implementation that allows DHTML-supported browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 客户端验证通过在将用户输入发送到服务器之前检查用户输入来增强验证过程。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 这允许在提交窗体前在客户端上检测到错误，从而避免服务器端验证所需的信息往返。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 默认情况下，此值设置为 `true` ，如果浏览器支持，它将启用客户端验证。By default, this value is set to `true`, which enables client-side validation if the browser supports it. 您可以逐个控制地禁用客户端验证。You can disable client-side validation on a control-by-control basis. 如果客户端上的动态更新创建了页面布局问题，或者你希望在进行验证之前执行一些服务器代码，这会很有用。This is useful if dynamic updating on the client creates problems with the layout of the page, or if you want to execute some server code before validation takes place. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性禁用客户端验证，以便可以在服务器上生成随机数字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to disable client-side validation so that the random numbers can be generated on the server. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

public: virtual property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用验证控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation control is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用验证控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the validation control is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否启用验证控件。Use the property to specify whether the validation control is enabled. 您可以通过将此属性设置为来禁用验证控件 `false` 。You can disable the validation control by setting this property to `false`. 将 或 属性设置为 `false` 将阻止执行验证。Setting either the or the property to `false` will prevent validation from being performed. 这会使 属性的计算结果始终为 `true` 。This causes the property to always evaluate to `true`. 属性与属性略有不同 。The property is slightly different from the property. 如果 验证控件的属性设置为 `true` ，但 属性设置为 `false` ，则仍会为客户端验证呈现验证控件，但处于禁用状态。If the property for a validation control is set to `true`, but the property is set to `false`, the validation control is still rendered for client-side validation, but in a disabled state. 然后，可以使用 DHTML 脚本在客户端上重新启用验证控件。You can then re-enable the validation control on the client by using DHTML script. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在网页 上使用服务器端代码启用或禁用验证控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable or disable the validation controls on the Web page using server-side code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic BaseValidator.Enabled Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在网页 上使用客户端代码启用或禁用验证控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to enable or disable the validation controls on the Web page using client-side code.

span.span: Gets or sets the text for the error message displayed in a control when validation fails.

value.span: 验证失败时 控件中显示的错误消息。

span.span: The error message displayed in a control when validation fails.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件时 ，在 当前验证控件的验证失败时，使用属性指定要在控件中显示的文本。When using a control, use the property to specify the text to display in the control when validation fails for the current validation control. 若要指定要在验证控件本身中显示的文本，请使用 属性。To specify the text to display in the validation control itself, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果在 未设置属性的情况下设置属性，则该 属性的值 也会显示在验证控件中。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性为 控件和和控件指定不同的消息 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify different messages for the control and the and controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示关联的输入控件是否通过验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the associated input control passes validation.

value.span: 如果关联的输入控件通过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the associated input control passes validation; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定关联的输入控件是否通过验证。Use the property to determine whether the associated input control passes validation. > [!CAUTION] > 由于此属性的默认值为 `true` ，因此， `true` 如果在执行验证之前查询此属性，它将返回。Because the default value of this property is `true`, it will return `true` if you query this property before validation is performed. 例如，如果您尝试在页的事件中使用此属性，则可能会发生这种情况 。For example, this might occur if you attempt to use this property in the event of a page. 仅在调用方法时才计算属性 。The property is evaluated only when the method is called. 您可以 分别为该页上的每个验证控件调用方法，也可以使用方法一次调用所有这些验证控件 。You can call the method for each validation control on the page individually, or call all of them at once by using the method. 其 `CausesValidation` 属性设置为的按钮控件 `true` 也将调用 方法。Button controls with their `CausesValidation` property set to `true` will also call the method. > [!NOTE] > 在发生验证后，可以手动更改此属性的值。It is possible to change the value of this property manually after validation has taken place. 这允许您根据需要替代验证结果。This allows you to override the validation result, if necessary. `true` 仅当 页面上每个验证控件的属性都设置为时，才将页面的属性设置为 `true` 。The property for the page is set to `true` only if the property for each validation control on the page is also set to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定关联的输入控件是否通过验证。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether the associated input control passes validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在调用基控件的 方法之后， 如果满足以下条件，则将属性设置为：After this method calls the base control's method, it sets the property to if the following conditions are true: - 尚未设置属性。The property is not already set. - 属性表示早于的 ASP.NET 版本 `4.0` 。The property indicates an ASP.NET version earlier than `4.0`. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 和更高版本中的验证器控件不会以红色显示错误。By default, validator controls in ASP.NET 4 and later versions do not display errors in red. 有关如何控制验证程序控件的视觉外观的信息，请参阅 [在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100))。For information about how to control the visual appearance of validator controls, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/7kh55542(v=vs.100)). 此方法还会在页面上注册验证控件。This method also registers the validation control on the page.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法已被重写，以检查客户端浏览器，并在呈现之前配置验证控件的兼容性。This method has been overridden to check the client browser and configure the validation control for compatibility prior to rendering. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法已被重写，以便取消注册页面上的验证控件。This method has been overridden to unregister the validation control on the page. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

value.span: 如果由 指定的控件是有效控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control specified by is a valid control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定 属性是否包含有效的输入控件。Use the property to determine whether the property contains a valid input control. 若要成为有效的输入控件， 必须将属性设置为页上的控件。To be a valid input control, the property must be set to a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: 在 属性中没有指定任何值。

span.span: No value is specified in the property.
-or-

span.span: The input control specified by the property is not found on the page.

span.span: if the browser supports "uplevel" rendering; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定客户端的浏览器是否支持 "上级" 呈现。Use the property to determine whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering. 为了使浏览器支持 "上级" 呈现，该浏览器必须支持文档对象模型 (DOM) 版本4或更高版本以及 ECMAScript 版本1.2 或更高版本的 Microsoft Internet Explorer。For a browser to support "uplevel" rendering, it must support Microsoft Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM) version 4 or later and ECMAScript version 1.2 or later. > [!NOTE] > 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。This property is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在验证失败时是否将焦点设置到 属性指定的控件上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus is set to the control specified by the property when validation fails.

value.span: 如果在验证失败时将焦点设置到 指定的控件上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to set focus on the control specified by when validation fails; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 当此验证控件失败时焦点是否自动设置为属性指定的控件。Use the property to specify whether focus is automatically set to the control specified by the property when this validation control fails. 这样，用户就可以快速更新相应的控件。This allows the user to quickly update the appropriate control. 如果多个验证控件失败并且此属性设置为 `true` ，则 第一个验证控件在属性中指定的控件接收焦点。If multiple validation controls fail and this property is set to `true`, the control specified in the property for the first validation control receives focus. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置验证失败时验证控件中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.

value.span: 验证失败时验证控件中显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当验证失败时，使用属性指定要在验证控件中显示的文本。Use the property to specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails. 还可以通过使用控件显示页中验证失败的所有控件的摘要 。You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a control. 若要指定要在控件中显示的文本 ，请使用 属性。To specify the text to display in a control, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果在 未设置属性的情况下设置属性，则该 属性的值 也会显示在验证控件中。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control.

summary.span: 对关联的输入控件执行验证并更新 属性。

span.span: Performs validation on the associated input control and updates the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法对关联的输入控件执行验证。Use the method to perform validation on the associated input control. 此方法允许你以编程方式对输入控件执行验证。This method allows you to programmatically perform validation on the input control. 属性会自动更新为验证结果。The property is automatically updated with the validation results. ## Examples 有关 派生类中使用的方法的示例，请参阅 类概述。For an example of the method used in a derived class, see the class overview.

summary.span: 获取或设置此验证控件所属的验证组的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.

value.span: 此验证控件所属的验证组的名称。

span.span: The name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了许多可以回发到服务器的控件。ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server. 当其中一个控件的 `CausesValidation` 属性设置为时 `true` ，将在控件回发到服务器时执行验证。When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to server. 以下控件能够回发到服务器：The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 其中某些控件只有在属性设置为时才会回发到服务器 `AutoPostBack` `true` 。Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`. 每个控件都有一个 `ValidationGroup` 属性，设置此属性后，当控件触发回发到服务器时，只验证指定组中的验证控件。These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server. 使用 属性将验证控件分配给验证组。Use the property to assign a validation control to a validation group. 类还公开了一个 方法和 接受输入参数的方法 。The class also exposes a method and a method that accept a input parameter. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性将验证控件分配给组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a validation control to a group. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseValidatorValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseValidatorValidationGroup/CS/BaseValidatorValidationGroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseValidatorValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseValidatorValidationGroup/VB/BaseValidatorValidationGroupvb.aspx#1)]
